mapper.insert: insert into my_calendar ( cal_no , emp_no , cal_title , cal_default ) values ( seq_calno.nextval , seq_empno.currval , '내 일정' , 'Y' )
mapper.select: select cal_no , emp_name , cal_title , cal_default , create_date , cal_color from my_calendar join employee using(emp_no) where emp_no = #{empNo}
